data.name: The Settlers® - Rise Of An Empire
data.detailed_description:
In Settlers: Rise of an Empire, the player creates their own empire of bustling cities in a captivating medieval world. However, threats are always looming so you must be prepared to defend your mighty kingdom.

Features:

  • Plot your expansion, manage your resources wisely, and provide for your people. Settlers: Rise of an Empire offers an easy to pick-up gameplay that allows everybody from newbies to strategy experts to enjoy the game.
  • Build up armies, vehicles, and walls to protect your empire. Everything depends on your economy: Is your empire wealthy enough to supply a powerful defense force?
  • Work together with one friend and play against another team: Will your division of labor be efficient enough to beat your opponent?
  • The four climatic zones and the four seasons have full impact on recourse management and gameplay
  • All Settlers have their own daily life and they interact naturally with each other

data.short_description: In Settlers: Rise of an Empire, the player creates their own empire of bustling cities in a captivating medieval world. However, threats are always looming so you must be prepared to defend your mighty kingdom. Features: Plot your expansion, manage your resources wisely, and provide for your people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
• Supported OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista (only)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP 2000+ (3.0 GHz Pentium 4 or Athlon 64 3400+ recommended)
  • Memory: 512 MB (1 GB recommended)
  • Graphics: 128 MB DirectX 9.0c-compliant, Shader 1.3-enabled video card (256 MB recommended) (see supported list*)
  • DirectX Version: DirectX 9 or higher
  • Sound: 100% DirectX 9.0 compatible sound card
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB free
  • Peripherals Supported: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
  • Multiplayer: Broadband Internet connection with 128 kbps Kbps upstream or faster.
  • *Supported Video Cards: NVIDIA GeForce 4Ti / FX / 6 / 7 / 8 families (GeForce 4MX NOT supported) ,ATI Radeon 9500-9800 / X / HD families
    Laptop versions of these cards are not fully supported.
